node.name: Annotate Add-On for the IBM Rational ClearCase SCM Adapter
node.shortdescription:
The "Annotate Add-On for the IBM Rational ClearCase SCM Adapter" extends the ClearCase Eclipse plugin with the "annotate" feature.

Version 2 is released. New features are:

- A ClearCase history view is displayed together with the annotated source
- From the ClearCase history view any version of the annotated element can be opened

A functionally limited demo version can be installed from the "Update Site URL" in this entry. A fully functional time-limited evaluation version can be downloaded after registration.
node.body:
The "Annotate Add-On for the IBM Rational ClearCase SCM Adapter" extends the ClearCase Eclipse plugin with the "annotate" feature.

Version 2 is released. New features are:

- A ClearCase history view is displayed together with the annotated source
- From the ClearCase history view any version of the annotated element can be opened

A functionally limited demo version can be installed from the "Update Site URL" in this entry. A fully functional time-limited evaluation version can be downloaded after registration.
